channel.title: Creating server
channel.description: Please i am so so so confused. i have downloaded my server and stuff and got it running but the thing is.... i have no clue on how to like spawn stuff and like change stuff in the client thing. i know i sound really dumb, but i dont get how to like read and change the stuff. i want to know how to be able to like type ::2bil and thats wat u get and have npcs were u can buy stuff. to mainky some up what im saying is how to customize my server and stuff... i also have another question though. :( i also want to know when i downloaded and started up my server i was just getting my levels up i got banned and i want to know how to like be in total control of (MY) server so i can be in charge of who gets banned and stuff. please i just want some help. look into your hearts to find someone who doesnt know much about this stuff and remember your patients :)

item.title: Creating server
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

not all servers let u make admin from the char file if that fails go to ur client and search staff = 1
and then scroll down and u see the player rights 3 thing put ur name in the admin spot

Read full topic

item.title: Creating server
item.dc:creator: @Waffles1 Waffles!!
item.description:
@Waffles1 wrote:

Darkstar,
Make threads for problems you encounter and help you want. Take it one step at a time. Or if you must do multiples, use numbers instead of one long paragraph.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating server
item.dc:creator: @fireman7778 fireman7778
item.description:
@fireman7778 wrote:

ok, firstly about you being owner, go into file CHARACTERS and look up ur name, open it up and change character rights to 3. Then save. You should be owner now, and depending on source have a crown.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating server

item.description:

Please i am so so so confused. i have downloaded my server and stuff and got it running but the thing is… i have no clue on how to like spawn stuff and like change stuff in the client thing. i know i sound really dumb, but i dont get how to like read and change the stuff. i want to know how to be able to like type ::2bil and thats wat u get and have npcs were u can buy stuff. to mainky some up what im saying is how to customize my server and stuff… i also have another question though. i also want to know when i downloaded and started up my server i was just getting my levels up i got banned and i want to know how to like be in total control of (MY) server so i can be in charge of who gets banned and stuff. please i just want some help. look into your hearts to find someone who doesnt know much about this stuff and remember your patients
